metadata.title: Widespread use of face masks in public may slow the spread of SARS CoV-2: 1 an ecological study 2 3 4

abstract.original_text: CoV-2 epidemics is unknown. Individual level studies have found that the use of face 37 masks was protective for the acquisition and transmission of a range of respiratory 38 viruses including SARS CoV-1. We hypothesized that population level usage of face 39 masks may be negatively associated SARS CoV-2 spread. 40 41
